One of the principal themes is illness (espeacilly genetic ones), prostitution, alcoholism or poverty
One of the main aims of the text is not to tell actions but describe
The themes and scenes were normal to many people of the time in which the text happens

Some historical characters or scenes are represented and have a great importance in the text

One of the main aims of the text is not to tell actions but present ideas and opinions
The text presents the story as the memories of the narrator or one of the main characters
One of the main aims of the text is to represent ideas (religious or not) that should be followed or avoided

The text presents important aspects of the political development of existing or non-existing places.
The text describe the intellectual or personal growth of the protagonist.

value_list: Subgenre where the history of the literature has placed the text
Name of the place (city or village) where the majority of the text takes place

description: The texts represents realistic places and actions
The texts represents not realistic places and actions

value_list: Name of the territory (province, community, Bundesland...) where the majority of the text takes place
Name of the country where the majority of the text takes place, in English
Name of the continent where the majority of the text takes place, in English
Name of the most important person for the text, as complete as possible

description: The person is rich or has a very high social position
The incomes of the person are related to work and basic needs (food, house, clothes, etc.) are covered
The person has difficulties to pay basic needs (food, house, cloths)

value_list: Time span from the beginning of the text until the end, expressed in days trying to round in years or months (1 year = 365)
Artistic movement that is related to the text
Name of the group of texts from the same author, that the text is part of

description: The majority of the aspects of the main character or the narrator has very clear similarities to the author's life, many times recognized by the author or the critic
There are some similarities between the main character or narrator and the life of the author but other parts of the text has no relation
There are no special similiratires between the main character or narrator and the life of the author
Any kind of position in religious organization
Any kind of position whose first aim is to achieve of prove non-religious knowledge (also work in the humanities)
The texts ends in a positive way, specially with: wedding, kiss, redemption, victory, birth, obtaining some important goal, improvement of socioeconomic or sentimental situation
The texts ends in a way that is not clearly positive or negative
The texts ends in a negative way, specially with: death, violence, depression, loss, deterioration of socioeconomic or sentimental situation
If it is known, the year of the beginning of the text. If we only know the decade, the last number can be replaced with ?
Subgenre information from editor. The source should be with the attribute resp.
